trans-unit.source: Test classes, classes marked with the '[TestClass]' attribute, should respect the following layout to be considered valid by MSTest: - it should be 'public' - it should not be 'static' - it should not be generic.
trans-unit.target: Test classes, classes marked with the '[TestClass]' attribute, should respect the following layout to be considered valid by MSTest: - it should be 'public' - it should not be 'static' - it should not be generic.

trans-unit.source: Test class '{0}' should not be generic
trans-unit.target: Test class '{0}' should not be generic

trans-unit.source: Test classes should have valid layout
trans-unit.target: Test classes should have valid layout

trans-unit.source: Test methods, methods marked with the '[TestMethod]' attribute, should respect the following layout to be considered valid by MSTest: - it should be 'public' - it should not be 'static' - it should not be generic - it should not be 'abstract' - return type should be 'void' or 'Task' - it should be a method of kind 'ordinary'.
trans-unit.target: Test methods, methods marked with the '[TestMethod]' attribute, should respect the following layout to be considered valid by MSTest: - it should be 'public' - it should not be 'static' - it should not be generic - it should not be 'abstract' - return type should be 'void' or 'Task' - it should be a method of kind 'ordinary'.

trans-unit.source: Test method '{0}' should not be generic
trans-unit.target: Test method '{0}' should not be generic

trans-unit.source: Test method '{0}' should be an 'ordinary' method
trans-unit.target: Test method '{0}' should be an 'ordinary' method

trans-unit.source: Test methods should have valid layout
trans-unit.target: Test methods should have valid layout

trans-unit.source: By default, MSTest runs tests sequentially which can lead to severe performance limitations. It is recommended to enable assembly attribute 'Parallelize' or if the assembly is known to not be parallelizable, to use explicitly the assembly level attribute 'DoNotParallelize'.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，MSTest 依順序執行測試，這可能會導致嚴重的效能限制。建議啟用組件屬性 'Parallelize'，或者如果已知組件不可平行處理，則明確使用組件層級的屬性 'DoNotParallelize'。

trans-unit.source: Explicitly enable or disable tests parallelization
trans-unit.target: 明確啟用或停用測試平行處理

trans-unit.source: Explicitly enable or disable tests parallelization
trans-unit.target: 明確啟用或停用測試平行處理
